decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Cloudpost and other land cards to cast high-costed Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul and Ulamog. It also utilizes cards like Crop Rotation and Once Upon a Time to find key pieces like The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale or Eye of Ugin. Karn, the Great Creator is included to tutor for necessary artifacts and disrupt opponent's strategies. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and cards while controlling the game with a mix of ramp and disruption.

This deck focuses on using Nomads en-Kor and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to manipulate the top cards of the library and then win the game by using Thassa's Oracle to self-mill and win the game. The deck also includes ways to protect its combo pieces with counterspells like Force of Will and disruption with cards like Swords to Plowshares. The deck utilizes card draw and manipulation to consistently set up the combo and has a toolbox of creatures that can be searched for with Green Sun's Zenith to deal with various situations.

The deck revolves around the combo of using Nomads en-Kor and Delighted Halfling to continuously target Nadu, Winged Wisdom with damage redirection effects, creating a loop that allows you to draw your entire deck. This allows you to set up your win condition while disrupting your opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal. The deck also utilizes powerful support cards like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Teferi, Time Raveler to control the board and protect your combo. The mana base is designed to support all the colors needed for the combo pieces and interaction spells.

The main concept of this deck revolves around the combo card Doomsday, which allows for a powerful win condition when played strategically. The deck includes a mix of control elements like Force of Will and Thoughtseize, along with acceleration cards like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to help set up the combo. Supporting cards like Massacre and Fatal Push provide removal options, while Murktide Regent adds additional threats to the board. The deck aims to quickly assemble the necessary pieces for the Doomsday combo and secure a win before the opponent can respond effectively.

This Merfolk deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy, utilizing powerful lords like Lord of Atlantis and Master of the Pearl Trident to buff up your creatures. The deck includes disruptive spells like Chalice of the Void and Force of Will to control the game, while also having ways to protect your creatures like Phantasmal Image and True-Name Nemesis. By utilizing Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and mana denial with Wasteland, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan.
